item.title: Ray Dalio sells his last remaining stake in Bridgewater, steps away from hedge fund's board
item.description: Bridgewater completed the final transition of Dalio's equity shares, wrapping up his management transition started in 2022.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Amazon, Coinbase, Reddit, Apple and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: Fed governors Bowman, Waller explain their dissents, say waiting to cut rates threatens economy
item.description: Two Federal Reserve officials who voted this week against holding a key interest rate in place explained their decisions Friday.

item.title: Emergency funds are a 'security blanket' for 401(k) savings, Vanguard researcher says. Here's why
item.description: Rainy-day funds help prevent savers — especially hourly workers — from raiding their retirement accounts.

item.title: TikTok took the world by storm. Now, Chinese companies are taking videos further with AI
item.description: Chinese companies are capitalizing on a trove of video and gaming experience to ramp up money-making AI tools for generating videos and visual effects...
